::Zardus::

Zardus recieves Cerebrus' transmission. He presses a button on his 
wrist comp, which launches a small transport pod to Cerebrus' 
location.

"Of course," Zardus replies, "The pod is underway."

He looks at Najah and Lady Hawk. "I have buisness to take care of. 
Lady Hawk, you're stationed at this lab for now. The ship will be 
watching you closely, so be careful. Najah, you can stay and guard if 
you wish. If not, go to the cargo bay underwater. Havoc and Repressor 
have brought something in. There's also a Maximal in there that is 
being slagged by internal defences, so the ship won't let you through 
until its done with the Maximal."

With that Zardus turns and heads for the exit of the Iron Fist.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Cerberus::
> 
>     "Zardus," Cerberus said. "I have now reached the Iron Fists 
posistion, any chance I could get a lift up?"
